briefdescription.para: An operator for calculating the inverse of the Jacobian at an O-point. This class is used in CombinedMapping to calculate the inverse of the Jacobian at an O-point when one of the mappings does not allow the evaluation of its Jacobian/inverse Jacobian at the O-point.

detaileddescription.para:
Specialisations of this class must implement:
A constructor taking the Mapping as an argument
An operator() returning the Jacobian matrix at the O-point.

parameterdescription.para: The mapping for which the inverse of the Jacobian is calculated.
The coordinate system in which the inverse of the Jacobian is calculated.
